text: .@DrTedros at @WHO  #COVID19 briefing -"I’m glad the #UNSecurityCouncil has voted in favour of #vaccine #equity....At the same time, if we’re going to take practical solutions, then the waiver of #IntellectualProperty should be taken seriously" @WTO  https://t.co/CNls6b5nar https://t.co/Qj9VFZyetU
